item.title: 印度基金击败93%同行，押注互联网价值股
item.description: 印度那些发展迅猛却备受打击的互联网公司，是班丹小盘股基金的关键投资标的。该基金去年押注深度价值股，业绩超越93%的同类基金。【原文：India’s fast-growing but beaten-down Internet firms are among key picks for the Bandhan Small Cap Fund, which beat 93% of its peers last year betting on deep-value stocks.】

item.title: 澳大利亚失业率维持低位，支持央行加息立场
item.description: 澳大利亚1月份失业率维持低位，招聘活动依然强劲，这印证了澳大利亚储备银行的观点：经济能够承受更紧缩的货币政策，而不会出现裁员激增的情况。【原文：Australian unemployment stayed low in January and hiring remained strong, validating the Reserve Bank’s view that the economy can withstand tighter monetary policy without a sharp rise in layoffs.】

item.title: 英国预算"操作空间"已成有害执念，英国财政研究所警告
item.description: 英国财政研究所表示，英国应将现行简单的财政规则合格/不合格评估方式，替换为更全面的"交通灯"系统，以终结近年来"失灵的政策制定"。【原文：The UK should replace its simple pass-fail approach to fiscal rules with a broader “traffic lights” system to end the “dysfunctional policy making” of recent years, the Institute of Fiscal Studies said.】

item.title: Zip股价创2014年以来最大跌幅，此前公司警告盈利停滞
item.description: Zip公司股价创下十余年来最大跌幅，此前这家澳大利亚数字支付公司预计本财年下半年现金收益增长将趋于平稳。【原文：Zip Co. shares notched their biggest drop in more than a decade after the Australian digital payments company guided toward flat cash earnings growth in the second half of the financial year.】

item.title: 蓝猫贷款出售筹集14亿美元用于投资者偿付
item.description: 蓝猫资本公司搁置两只私募信贷基金合并计划三个月后，已另辟蹊径为投资者提供承诺的流动性——出售贷款。【原文：Three months after Blue Owl Capital Inc. shelved a merger between two private credit funds, it has found a different way to provide investors with promised liquidity - selling loans.】

item.title: 金价持稳，交易清淡之际市场焦点转向美联储加息计划
item.description: 黄金价格企稳，此前周三曾跳涨2%。部分亚洲市场因农历新年假期休市，交易员们正密切关注美联储下一步的利率动向。【原文：Gold steadied, after jumping 2% on Wednesday, with some Asian markets closed for Lunar New Year holidays and traders focused on the Federal Reserve’s next move on interest rates.】

item.title: 日银新任理事高市早苗的首轮政策选择或暗示其利率路径预期
item.description: 首相高市早苗面临关键抉择：将任命何人填补日本银行理事会空缺席位。这些提名将向经济学家和投资者透露她希望对央行政策施加多大程度影响的信号。【原文：Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi faces a key decision on whom to tap for spots opening on the Bank of Japan’s board, nominations that will give economists and investors an indication of how aggressively she hopes to influence central bank policy.】

item.title: 受伊朗局势担忧影响，油价创十月以来最大涨幅
item.description: 油价在创下10月以来最大单日涨幅后趋稳，此前有报道称美国对伊朗的军事干预可能早于预期。【原文：Oil steadied after its biggest daily gain since October, following a report that American military intervention in Iran could come sooner than expected.】

item.title: Palantir在与人工智能初创公司前雇员的诉讼中部分胜诉
item.description: 一名法官认同Palantir Technologies公司的观点，认为三名前雇员在创立人工智能初创公司时很可能违反了保密协议和禁止招揽协议，但并未阻止他们在新公司Percepta继续工作。【原文：A judge agreed with Palantir Technologies Inc. that a trio of former employees likely violated confidentiality and non-solicitation agreements in founding their artificial intelligence startup but stopped short of halting their work at the new company, Percepta.】

item.title: 2025年外国投资者买入美国股票激增134%，尽管存在关税壁垒
item.description: 2025年，外国投资者购买的美国股票数量是前一年的两倍多，尽管特朗普总统的关税政策令市场动荡不安，企业前景蒙上阴影。【原文：Foreign investors bought more than twice the amount of US stocks in 2025 as they did a year before, even as President Donald Trump’s tariffs rattled markets and clouded corporate outlooks.】

item.title: 股价飙升16,831%后，Booking成为美国最昂贵股票之一
item.description: 美国股市中估值最高的股票之一即将迎来大幅折价。【原文：One of the highest price-tag stocks in the US equity market is about to get a deep-discount markdown.】

item.title: RBC聘请高盛交易员诺埃尔·雷耶斯，推进股票算法交易业务
item.description: 加拿大皇家银行已聘请高盛集团一名股票交易员兼执行专家，负责领导产品创新工作，该行正持续扩大其在全球股票市场的业务版图。【原文：Royal Bank of Canada has recruited a Goldman Sachs Group Inc. equities trader and execution specialist to lead product innovation as the bank continues to broaden its footprint in global stocks.】

item.title: 英国将强制科技公司48小时内删除侵权图片
item.description: 英国政府提出新规，要求科技公司在48小时内删除平台上的不当图像。此前数周，X平台用户利用该公司的人工智能工具生成数千张女性裸体图片，并将其大量发布至该社交媒体平台。【原文：The UK government has proposed rules that would require tech companies to remove abusive images from their sites within 48 hours, weeks after X users flooded the social media platform with thousands of pictures of undressed women they’d generated with the company’s artificial intelligence tool.】

item.title: 亚洲股市有望上涨，科技股提振美股：市场综述
item.description: 亚洲股市周四开盘有望走高，此前科技股反弹及强劲经济数据提振美股。美国国债收益率上升支撑美元走强，同时油价大幅攀升。【原文：Asian equities were set to open higher Thursday after a rebound in tech and robust economic data lifted US stocks. Higher Treasury yields supported the dollar, while oil jumped.】

item.title: 交易员为日本首次超长期债券测试做准备，该测试将在投票后进行
item.description: 周四日本20年期国债的拍卖将首次检验投资者对超长期债券的兴趣，此前首相高市早苗的压倒性胜利曾引发债券购买热潮。【原文：Thursday’s sale of 20-year Japanese government bonds will test investor appetite for super-long bonds for the first time since the landslide victory of Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi triggered a surge in buying.】

item.title: 通胀率下降，但美国人仍感负担能力受挤压
item.description: 完整阅读请访问：通胀率下降，但美国人仍感生活压力【原文：For the full experience visit: Inflation Is Down, But Americans Still Feel an Affordability Squeeze】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织警告称，中国的经济政策正在损害其他国家
item.description: 国际货币基金组织批评中国的经济政策导致国内资源浪费、对外造成损害，并呼吁北京调整方向，转向以国内消费支出为基础的经济模式。【原文：The International Monetary Fund faulted China’s economic policies for causing waste at home and damage abroad and called for a reorientation by Beijing to embrace a model based on domestic consumer spending.】

item.title: 外国投资者拒绝"抛售美国"，净买入1.6万亿美元资产
item.description: 周三数据显示，2025年外国对美国金融资产的购买加速，其中股票和美国国债需求尤为强劲——这有力驳斥了市场参与者讨论中屡见不鲜的"抛售美国资产"论调。【原文：Foreign purchases of US financial assets accelerated in 2025, led by demand for stocks and US Treasuries, data on Wednesday showed — marking a sharp rebuttal of the “Sell America” narrative that’s become a regular feature of discussion among market participants.】

item.title: 交易员"大规模"期权操作与美联储加息言论形成鲜明对比
item.description: 美国利率期权交易员纷纷押注美联储将比当前市场预期更早、更大幅度地降息，这种押注与部分政策制定者最新释放的信号形成鲜明对比——这些官员同时暗示了加息的可能性。【原文：Traders in US interest-rate options have piled into positions that would profit from the Federal Reserve cutting rates sooner and more aggressively than investors currently expect, a bet that contrasts with the latest signals from some policymakers who have also raised the possibility of hikes.】

item.title: 普利兹克计划终止数据中心税收优惠，因电费账单飙升
item.description: 伊利诺伊州州长JB·普利兹克正寻求暂时停止对数据中心的激励措施，以遏制飙升的电费支出。【原文：Illinois Governor JB Pritzker is seeking to temporarily halt incentives for data centers in a bid to contain soaring power bills.】

item.title: 摩根大通认为货币对冲激增加剧美元压力
item.description: 摩根大通策略师表示，外国投资者可能增加对美元计价资产的汇率风险对冲操作，这将加剧美元面临的下行压力。【原文：Foreign investors are likely to increase hedging against currency risk on their dollar-denominated holdings, adding to pressures weighing on the greenback, according to JPMorgan strategists.】

item.title: 伊斯兰圣城即将面临的剧变
item.description:
在今天的《大视野》播客中：随着沙特阿拉伯经济逐步摆脱对石油的依赖，对国际投资者的限制有所放宽，外国人首次获准在麦加购买房产。【原文：

On today’s Big Take podcast: As Saudi Arabia shifts its economy away from oil, looser restrictions on international investors have allowed foreigners to buy property in Mecca for the first time.

】

item.title: 博克1季度业绩超预期，计划实施25比1股票分割
item.description: Booking Holdings Inc.公布的第一季度总预订量超出预期，表明旅游业整体持续保持强劲势头。【原文：Booking Holdings Inc. reported better-than-expected first-quarter gross bookings, indicating continued strength across the travel industry.】

item.title: 对冲基金AlphaQuest连续三年亏损后宣告关闭
item.description: AlphaQuest这家拥有约25年历史的量化对冲基金，在近期将"Alpha"加入其名称后，因连续三年亏损而宣布停业。【原文：AlphaQuest, the roughly 25-year-old quantitative hedge fund that recently added “Alpha” to its name, is calling it quits after three consecutive years of losses.】

item.title: eBay收购时尚平台Depop，业绩表现强劲
item.description: eBay公司同意以约12亿美元收购Depop，旨在吸引年轻消费者，并在日益拥挤的电子商务市场中脱颖而出。【原文：EBay Inc. agreed to buy Depop for about $1.2 billion in an effort to attract younger shoppers and stand out in an increasingly cluttered e-commerce market.】

item.title: Figma因强劲增长前景缓解人工智能担忧而股价上涨
item.description: 创意软件制造商Figma公司公布年度营收预期超出市场预期后，其股价在盘后交易中大幅上涨，缓解了华尔街对该公司业务因人工智能产品崛起而受威胁的担忧。【原文：Figma Inc. shares jumped in extended trading after the creative software maker gave an annual revenue outlook that topped estimates, easing Wall Street anxiety that the business is threatened by the emergence of rival artificial intelligence products.】

item.title: 爱迪生公司因洛杉矶致命火灾大幅削减高管奖金
item.description: 爱迪生国际公司将高管奖金削减40%，以反映洛杉矶地区毁灭性野火的影响——这场火灾造成19人死亡，并损毁或摧毁了超过10,000栋建筑。【原文：Edison International is cutting top executive bonuses by 40% to reflect the impact of the devastating Los Angeles-area wildfire that killed 19 people and damaged or destroyed more than 10,000 structures.】

item.title: DoorDash因成本上升和风暴影响发布疲软盈利预期
item.description: DoorDash公司发布的盈利预期未达华尔街预期，这家外卖配送企业警告称，美国冬季风暴及对增长领域的投资将短期内拖累利润。【原文：DoorDash Inc. issued an earnings outlook that missed Wall Street’s expectations, with the delivery company warning that winter storms in the US and investments into growth areas will weigh on profits in the near term.】

item.title: 华纳兄弟交易暗示市场预期将提高收购报价
item.description: 华纳兄弟控制权争夺战的最新转折，让交易员们押注某位竞购者将提高报价。【原文：The latest twist in the drama for control over Warner Bros. has traders betting one of the suitors will sweeten its bid.】

item.title: Remitly首席执行官卸任，由桑坦德银行高管接任
item.description: 马特·奥本海默将卸任支付网络公司Remitly Global Inc.首席执行官一职，由桑坦德银行的塞巴斯蒂安·甘宁汉姆接任。【原文：Matt Oppenheimer is stepping down as chief executive officer of payments network Remitly Global Inc. and will be succeeded by Banco Santander SA’s Sebastian Gunningham.】
